quote: GUI testing involves performing some tasks and comparing the result with the expected output.
Model Based Testing (MBT) is a quick and organized method which automates the testing process through automated test suite generation and execution techniques and tools.
An Event Interaction Graph (EIG) is generated for the application to be tested and seed test suites are generated for two-way interactions of GUI events.
These automated test case generation process is shown in Figure 3.
The advantages are it generates smaller test suites with better coverage on the longer test sequences.
Genetic algorithm is used as a repair algorithm.
The effectiveness of crash test is known by the total number of test cases used to detect maximum faults.
The advantages are: contexts are incorporated, detects more faults when compared to the previous techniques used.
An adequate number of faults of each fault type are seeded fairly.
